modules.description: The module provides operations for asynchronous Slack API interactions via Lwt.t promises, including session management, channel and message manipulation, user and group administration, OAuth2 integration, and detailed error handling for API conditions like rate limiting or authentication failures. It works with data structures representing Slack entities (users, channels, messages, files), session tokens, and variant types for API responses and errors. Specific use cases include automating team workflows, building chatbots, integrating Slack with external systems, securely managing API sessions, and handling permission or rate-limit constraints in real-time messaging.
